test_description: Verify multi-tenant isolation prevents cross-account data access via API manipulation
business_risk: Critical - Data leakage between merchants destroys trust and violates GDPR/CCPA
preconditions: Two distinct merchant accounts (Merchant A, Merchant B) exist; User A logged in
test_steps: 1. User A requests data for Merchant A (Success); 2. User A manually modifies API request ID to target Merchant B resource; 3. Send Request; 4. Verify Response
expected_result: Server returns 403 Forbidden or 404 Not Found; No data from Merchant B is exposed
test_data_needs: Seeded data for two tenants; Valid JWT for Tenant A
environment_requirements: Integration Environment with Seeded Multi-tenant Data
success_criteria: Zero data leakage; Audit log records security violation attempt
regression_frequency: Every PR involving API or Middleware
security_considerations: Check for IDOR (Insecure Direct Object References)

test_description: Verify Salla Historical Sync handles API Rate Limits (HTTP 429) gracefully
business_risk: High - Sync failure leads to incomplete analytics and onboarding churn
preconditions: Mock Salla API configured to throw 429 after 50 requests; Sync Job queued
test_steps: 1. Trigger 24-month historical sync; 2. Mock API returns 429 with Retry-After header; 3. Monitor Background Worker; 4. Verify Backoff strategy execution
expected_result: Job pauses for specified duration; Resumes automatically; Completes without failure status
test_data_needs: Mocked Salla API responses; 24 months of order data structure
tools_required: Jest; Nock (for API mocking); Upstash QStash (simulation)
success_criteria: 100% data ingestion despite rate limits; No zombie jobs
security_considerations: Ensure tokens not logged during errors
performance_expectations: Job recovery within 1 minute of retry window

test_description: Validate Accuracy of Text-to-SQL Generation against Golden Set
business_risk: Medium - Incorrect data insights lead to bad business decisions
preconditions: ClickHouse Schema finalized; OpenAI API available; Golden Set defined
test_steps: 1. Feed 'Golden Set' of 50 natural language queries; 2. Generate SQL via RAG Service; 3. Execute SQL against test DB; 4. Compare result with expected baseline
expected_result: Generated SQL is syntactically correct; Result data matches baseline values exactly
test_data_needs: Golden Set JSON (Question, Expected SQL, Expected Result); ClickHouse Dataset
